title: Photo-thermal conversion ability of PEG and H2O based microfluids of sodium lignosulfonate and its carbonized form

In the present work, colloidal systems of sodium lignosulfonate (Lignin) and its carbonized form (C-Lignin) in H2O and polyethylene glycol (PEG) were synthesized and used for solar-thermal conversion. PEG and...
